summary: Implements a WebRTC RTP receiver that processes incoming RTP and RTCP packets, decodes audio/video frames, manages jitter buffering, generates NACKs, tracks synchronization sources, and exposes a remote media track along with detailed stream statistics and timestamp mapping.
business_intent: Provide the core functionality for realâ€‘time media reception in WebRTC applications, enabling developers to receive, decode, and monitor audio or video streams from peers.
